divs: sighting detailsmy younger brother and i (ages aprox 10 and 13) were upstairs in our home doing homework and our parents were downstairs watching television. we had a large picture window on the back of the house and also a large picture window at the front of the house (bi-level home). i happened to see a bright light out the back window...it appeared to be a mile or so away, not far above the trees moving too slowly to be a plane. it was cigar shaped...very bright. at first i thought maybe a helicopter due to its slow steady movement. i called my brother to the window. as we watched the object moved from east to west over the tree line. after a minute or so it began to move irratically...up, down, side to side. at this point we were pretty sure what we were seeing was not a helicopter but a ufo. the object stopped in mid air...then appeared to change shape into a cross and a light shot down from the object toward the ground. my brother ran downstairs to alert my parents (they didn't believe him) and while he was down stairs the light zipped back up into the craft, it changed back to its original shape and then sped off so fast toward the west that i couldn't follow it...i ran to the front window but it was gone. the entire sighting lasted about 10 to 15 minutes. around that same time period i also destinctly remember my dad coming home one evening after driving from his mother's house in southern michigan (aprox 30 minutes from our home) as white as a sheet. he was visibly terrified. my initial thought was he'd hit something or someone on the way home. he proceeded to tell me that his van had been followed closely by a ufo...if he stopped, it stopped. he said it was no more than a few feet above and behind him 1\2 way home. i'd never seen my dad that frightened and i completely believed him. he never mentioned it again.
